message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $9,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I value the product at a higher price point. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $9,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still feel that $8,500 would be a fair price for both of us. I hope you can consider this proposal.
